trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref> class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to list child objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference and access control type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information, and inherited object type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
